message: The contrib module?
django-atompub?
I love Ben Firshman's improvements to the contrib module
use that for everything
@simonw would that be https://github.com/bfirsh/syndication-view ?
nah, it's in Django core now
it's how Django feeds should always have worked
I hated how the old feeds stuff was coupled to your URLs in weird ways
Oh yeah! The new stuff.
I totally forgot that happened.
I still have to wrap them in a view function though, to get the right content type

response = TopicInPlaceFeed()(request, (topic, place))
    response['Content-Type'] = 'application/atom+xml; charset=utf-8'
    return response
we don't have analytics on any of our feeds at the moment :/
what I really want though is a FeedBurner for dynamic feeds
other than the numbers the Google webmaster tools provide https://www.google.com/webmasters/tools/subscribers
@simonw is there a bug open for the content-type issue? Seems like something you ought to be able to set in the feed class, rather than having to wrap.
@simonw awesome, since that worked so well, if I prod again will a patch appear ;-)
no, and there should be - I'll open one, thanks for the prod
filed http://code.djangoproject.com/ticket/15237
@carljm if he doesn't write one I'll do it for 1.4
